attributes.action: oppose the HMRC proposal to move work from local offices in Halifax, Huddersfield, Keighley, Skipton and to centralize it in Bradford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We oppose the proposal that HMRC (as part of it's job cuts programme)removes work from our local offices in Halifax, Huddersfield, Keighley and Skipton and centralize it in Bradford. This will result in increased hardship for our staff members, loss of income to the local economy in these towns and
will increase congestion in Bradford and add pressure on public transport

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "oppose the HMRC proposal to move work from local offices in Halifax, Huddersfield, Keighley, Skipton and to centralize it in Bradford."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13387.asp
